frame.name: Weather
frame.definition: <def-root>Ambient conditions of temperature, precipitation, windiness, and sunniness pertain at a certain <fen>Place</fen> and <fen>Time</fen>. Further <fen>Specification</fen> of the conditions that pertain may also be indicated. <ex><x>A <fex name="Specification">blustery</fex> <t>storm</t></x> <gov>blew</gov> <gov>in</gov>.</ex> <ex><m>There</m> <m>was</m> a <fex name="Spec">thick</fex> <t>blizzard</t> <fex name="Time">last night</fex>.</ex> <ex><x>An armada of <t>hailstorms</t></x> <gov>swept</gov> through the region.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the weather occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the weather occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Specification
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies a further <fen>Specification</fen> of the weather conditions. <ex>An <fex name="Spec">icy</fex> <t>storm</t> hit the Northeast last night.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: blizzard.n
lexUnit.definition: met veel sneeuw en felle kou die plotseling opkomt
